EventTriggerThresholdParameter
struct
EventTriggerThresholdParameter
Types
Type

How the pin state affects the trigger WINDOW_TYPE  - 0x01 - Window comparison INTERVAL_TYPE - 0x02 - Trigger at evenly-spaced intervals

Determines the type of comparison
